channel.title: Compiler error: class, interface, or enum expected

item.title: Compiler error: class, interface, or enum expected
item.dc:creator: @Icandoit2 Icandoit2
item.description:
@Icandoit2 wrote:

Normally, when you get a a lot of errors, that means you missed a bracket, try using eclipse, it makes it simple to match brackets to their corresponding bracket.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error: class, interface, or enum expected
item.dc:creator: @Josephx Josephx
item.description:
@Josephx wrote:

I was just editing my commands.java forced text’s and I made sure I did not out of parentheses But I got the error in title in a shit ton of lines like 100+ i dont have enough space for al of it so I’ll just put one -

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“givesdonor”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“justin”)) {
try {
String playerToMod = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToMod)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage("YOU HAVE BEEN AWARDED SUPER DONOR STATUS BY " + c.playerName);
c2.playerRights = 4;
c2.isDonator = 1;

							break;
						} 
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}			
		}
